home.headline: Discover Nature's Finest Quality
home.description: From fresh eggs to premium meat, experience the difference that natural, hormone-free goodness brings to every bite.

meat.title: Power Your Body with Every Bite of The Miracle Quail
meat.subtitle: Discover the exceptional taste and nutrition of premium quail meat - nature's most nutritious protein source

benefits.title: Treats Anemia
benefits.description: Rich in iron and B12, quail meat helps increase hemoglobin levels and treats iron deficiency anemia effectively.

benefits.title: Strengthens Bones and Teeth
benefits.description: High in calcium, phosphorus, and vitamin D, quail meat promotes strong bone development and dental health.

benefits.title: Breaks Down Kidney Stones
benefits.description: Contains natural compounds that help dissolve kidney stones and support urinary tract health.

benefits.title: Relieves Allergies
benefits.description: Quail meat has anti-inflammatory properties that can help reduce allergic reactions and boost immune response.

benefits.title: Protects the Eye
benefits.description: Rich in vitamin A and antioxidants that support eye health and protect against age-related vision problems.

benefits.title: Suitable for Diet
benefits.description: Low in fat and calories while high in protein, making it perfect for weight management and healthy eating plans.

benefits.title: Supports Strength and Fertility
benefits.description: Contains essential nutrients that enhance muscle strength and support reproductive health for both men and women.

benefits.title: Strengthens Focus
benefits.description: High in B vitamins and omega-3s that improve concentration, mental clarity, and cognitive performance.

benefits.title: Improves Activity
benefits.description: Provides sustained energy and vitality through its rich nutrient profile, enhancing daily physical performance.

benefits.title: Promotes Brain Development in Children
benefits.description: Essential nutrients support healthy brain growth, speech development, and cognitive function in growing children.

cta.title: You're already holding the best.
cta.subtitle: Choose The Miracle Quail for premium quality and exceptional nutrition you can trust.
cta.description: Your body deserves the superior nutrition that only premium quail meat provides.
